sentence.Network_en: He is perched on a large rawboned hunter, half covered by a capacious saddle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他骑一匹瘦骨伶仃的大马, 用的鞍子很大,把马背遮掉了一半.

sentence.Network_en: Issachar is a rawboned donkey lying down between two saddle bags.
sentence.Network_cn: 以萨迦是个强壮的驴,卧在羊圈之中.
